org.openhubframework.openhub.api.common.quartz

Annotation Type QuartzCronTrigger


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface QuartzCronTrigger
    Defined one CronTrigger in QuartzJob.

    This type of trigger is used to fire a job at given moments in time, defined with Unix 'cron-like' schedule definitions.

    Cron expression when will be method called can be defined direct in annotation cronExpression() or in property cronExpressionProperty().

    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Roman Havlicek
    See Also:
    QuartzJob, CronTrigger, QuartzSimpleTrigger, JobExecuteTypeInCluster

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String cronExpression
      Cron expression when will be method called.
      String cronExpressionProperty
      Property name in which is saved cron expression when will be method called.
      String group
      Gets group of trigger.
      CronTriggerMisfireInstruction misfireInstruction
      Gets misfire instruction.
      String name
      Gets name of trigger.

    • Element Detail

      • group

        public abstract String group
        Gets group of trigger. If group is empty, default group will be used.

        Default:

        Default:
